title: Jobs.cz Scraper
description: Extract job listings from Jobs.cz, the leading Czech job portal. Search by keyword, location, and category, or provide a direct Jobs.cz search URL. The scraper automatically handles pagination and extracts comprehensive job details.

keyword.title: Job Keyword
keyword.description: Job title or skill to search for. Examples: 'vývojář', 'programátor', 'účetní', 'prodavač', 'projektový manažer'.

location.title: Location
location.description: City or region in Czech Republic. Examples: 'Praha', 'Brno', 'Ostrava', 'Plzeň'. Leave empty to search all locations.

collectDetails.title: Collect Full Job Details
collectDetails.description: Enable to visit each job detail page and extract complete job descriptions, requirements, and company information.

results_wanted.title: Maximum Results
results_wanted.description: Maximum number of job listings to scrape. Set a lower number for faster runs or higher for comprehensive data extraction.

max_pages.title: Maximum Pages
max_pages.description: Safety limit on the number of search result pages to crawl. Prevents excessive scraping.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Configure proxy settings for reliable scraping. Residential proxies recommended for Jobs.cz to avoid blocking.

dedupe.title: Deduplicate Results
dedupe.description: Automatically remove duplicate job listings based on URL to ensure unique results.
